name: Balance It! (Narosenla Longkumer)
description:
This is a 2D casual android game.  You are Hoshi, and she tries to balance a stick while collecting coins. Lets see how far you can go!

Game Engine Used: Unity 5.6.1f1 (64-bit)

Art : PaintTool SAI, Adobe Photoshop CS6

Music : Guitar, Mic, Audacity

For any queries/glitches : 1311naro@gmail.com
